title:
It has been clarified that no customer will pay any charges on making payments from UPI either from a bank account or any wallet. On March 29, NPCI also released a circular via a tweet, stating that no charges would be applied to peer-to-peer and peer-to-peer-merchant transactions between bank accounts and PPIs. 

Check the links given below to know more about the same.
